justification: The offer focuses only on Team A’s need at TE and ignores Team B’s conservative mindset and incentives. Team B would be trading a reliable Tier 2 TE (a position of strength) for a volatile RB (Sean Holt) and a declining, high-variance veteran WR (Darian Moore), which conflicts with their floor-first, veteran-stability preferences. The trade is structurally feasible and addresses A’s weakness, but the rationale is one-sided and thin, with little evidence of modeling B’s beliefs or motivations.
